AddAccessControlListEntry.title: AddAccessControlListEntry
AddAccessControlListEntry.summary: Adds IP entries to an access control list (ACL).

AddListenerWhiteListItem.title: AddListenerWhiteListItem
AddListenerWhiteListItem.summary: Adds IP addresses to the whitelist of a listener.

AddTags.title: AddTags
AddTags.summary: Adds tags to an SLB instance.

AddVServerGroupBackendServers.title: AddVServerGroupBackendServers
AddVServerGroupBackendServers.summary: Adds backend servers to a server group.

CreateLoadBalancer.title: CreateLoadBalancer
CreateLoadBalancer.summary: Creates a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

CreateMasterSlaveServerGroup.title: CreateMasterSlaveServerGroup
CreateMasterSlaveServerGroup.summary: Creates a primary/secondary server group. A primary/secondary server group can contain only two Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances. One of the ECS instances functions as the primary server and the other functions as the secondary server.

CreateRules.title: CreateRules
CreateRules.summary: Creates forwarding rules for an HTTP or HTTPS listener.

CreateTLSCipherPolicy.title: CreateTLSCipherPolicy
CreateTLSCipherPolicy.summary: Creates a Transport Layer Security (TLS) policy.

CreateVServerGroup.title: CreateVServerGroup
CreateVServerGroup.summary: Creates a server group and adds backend servers to the server group.

DeleteAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.title: DeleteAccessLogsDownloadAttribute
DeleteAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.summary: Deletes the access log of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

DeleteLoadBalancer.title: DeleteLoadBalancer
DeleteLoadBalancer.summary: Deletes a pay-as-you-go Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance.

DescribeAccessControlListAttribute.title: DescribeAccessControlListAttribute
DescribeAccessControlListAttribute.summary: Queries the configuration of an access control list (ACL).

DescribeAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.title: DescribeAccessLogsDownloadAttribute
DescribeAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.summary: Queries the access log of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the available resources and resources that are available for purchase in the zones of a region.

DescribeDomainExtensionAttribute.title: DescribeDomainExtensionAttribute
DescribeDomainExtensionAttribute.summary: Queries the attributes of an additional domain name.

DescribeHealthStatus.title: DescribeHealthStatus
DescribeHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health status of backend servers.

DescribeHighDefinationMonitor.title: DescribeHighDefinationMonitor
DescribeHighDefinationMonitor.summary: Queries the configurations of fine-grained monitoring in a region.

DescribeListenerAccessControlAttribute.title: DescribeListenerAccessControlAttribute
DescribeListenerAccessControlAttribute.summary: Queries the whitelist configurations of a listener.

DescribeLoadBalancerAttribute.title: DescribeLoadBalancerAttribute
DescribeLoadBalancerAttribute.summary: Queries the detail of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribut.title: DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribute
DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribut.summary: Queries the configurations of an HTTP listener.

DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribu.title: DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribute
DescribeLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribu.summary: Queries the configurations of an HTTPS listener.

DescribeLoadBalancerListeners.title: DescribeLoadBalancerListeners
DescribeLoadBalancerListeners.summary: Queries the listeners of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

DescribeLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute.title: DescribeLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute
DescribeLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute.summary: Queries the configuration of a TCP listener.

DescribeLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute.title: DescribeLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute
DescribeLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute.summary: Queries the configurations of a UDP listener.

DescribeMasterSlaveServerGroupAttribute.title: DescribeMasterSlaveServerGroupAttribute
DescribeMasterSlaveServerGroupAttribute.summary: Queries the details about a primary/secondary server group.

DescribeRuleAttribute.title: DescribeRuleAttribute
DescribeRuleAttribute.summary: Queries the configurations of a specified forwarding rule.

DescribeRules.title: DescribeRules
DescribeRules.summary: Queries the forwarding rules that are configured for a specified listener.

DescribeServerCertificates.title: DescribeServerCertificates
DescribeServerCertificates.summary: Queries the server certificates in a region.

DescribeVServerGroupAttribute.title: DescribeVServerGroupAttribute
DescribeVServerGroupAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a vServer group.

EnableHighDefinationMonitor.title: EnableHighDefinationMonitor
EnableHighDefinationMonitor.summary: Enables fine-grained monitoring for the current region.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resources.

ModifyHighDefinationMonitor.title: ModifyHighDefinationMonitor
ModifyHighDefinationMonitor.summary: Queries the configuration of fine-grained monitoring.

ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceChargeType.title: ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceChargeType
ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of a pay-as-you-go Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceSpec.title: ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceSpec
ModifyLoadBalancerInstanceSpec.summary: Modifies the specification of a CLB instance.

ModifyLoadBalancerInternetSpec.title: ModifyLoadBalancerInternetSpec
ModifyLoadBalancerInternetSpec.summary: Modifies the metering method of an Internet-facing Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

ModifyLoadBalancerPayType.title: ModifyLoadBalancerPayType
ModifyLoadBalancerPayType.summary: Changes the billing method of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

ModifyVServerGroupBackendServers.title: ModifyVServerGroupBackendServers
ModifyVServerGroupBackendServers.summary: Replaces the backend servers in a server group.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource to another resource group.

RemoveAccessControlListEntry.title: RemoveAccessControlListEntry
RemoveAccessControlListEntry.summary: Deletes an IP entry from an ACL.

RemoveListenerWhiteListItem.title: RemoveListenerWhiteListItem
RemoveListenerWhiteListItem.summary: Removes IP addresses or CIDR blocks from the whitelist of a listener.

RemoveTags.title: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.summary: Removes tags from a CLB instance.

RemoveVServerGroupBackendServers.title: RemoveVServerGroupBackendServers
RemoveVServerGroupBackendServers.summary: Removes one or more backend servers from a specified vServer group.

SetAccessControlListAttribute.title: SetAccessControlListAttribute
SetAccessControlListAttribute.summary: Modifies the name of an access control list (ACL).

SetAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.title: SetAccessLogsDownloadAttribute
SetAccessLogsDownloadAttribute.summary: Adds an access log forwarding rule to a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

SetCACertificateName.title: SetCACertificateName
SetCACertificateName.summary: Sets the name of a CA Certificate.

SetDomainExtensionAttribute.title: SetDomainExtensionAttribute
SetDomainExtensionAttribute.summary: Changes the certificate of an additional domain name.

SetListenerAccessControlStatus.title: SetListenerAccessControlStatus
SetListenerAccessControlStatus.summary: Enables or disables the whitelist of a specified listener.

SetLoadBalancerDeleteProtection.title: SetLoadBalancerDeleteProtection
SetLoadBalancerDeleteProtection.summary: Enables or disables deletion protection for an SLB instance.

SetLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribute.title: SetLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribute
SetLoadBalancerHTTPListenerAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of an HTTP listener.

SetLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribute.title: SetLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribute
SetLoadBalancerHTTPSListenerAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of an HTTPS listener.

SetLoadBalancerModificationProtection.title: SetLoadBalancerModificationProtection
SetLoadBalancerModificationProtection.summary: Modifies the configuration of the configuration read-only mode for a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

SetLoadBalancerName.title: SetLoadBalancerName
SetLoadBalancerName.summary: Modifies the name of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

SetLoadBalancerStatus.title: SetLoadBalancerStatus
SetLoadBalancerStatus.summary: Modifies the state of a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

SetLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute.title: SetLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute
SetLoadBalancerTCPListenerAttribute.summary: Modifies the configuration of a TCP listener.

SetLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute.title: SetLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute
SetLoadBalancerUDPListenerAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of a UDP listener.

SetRule.title: SetRule
SetRule.summary: Modifies a forwarding rule of a vServer group.

SetServerCertificateName.title: SetServerCertificateName
SetServerCertificateName.summary: Sets a name for a server certificate.

SetTLSCipherPolicyAttribute.title: SetTLSCipherPolicyAttribute
SetTLSCipherPolicyAttribute.summary: Configures a Transport Layer Security (TLS) policy.

SetVServerGroupAttribute.title: SetVServerGroupAttribute
SetVServerGroupAttribute.summary: Modifies the configurations of a server group.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds the tags to resources.
